actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) modify the article description of cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds, and (2) extend temporarily the reduction of duty on such articles.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on cast stainless steel single-piece exhaust gas manifolds.
